title: Fairly heavy showers expected in parts of the island
byline: The Meteorology Department says showers or thundershowers will occur at times in Eastern and Uva provinces and in Polonnaruwa, Matale, Nuwara-Eliya and Hambantota districts.

title: 16 dead, 16 missing as fire crews try to corral Los Angeles blazes before winds return this week
byline: Firefighters scrambled Sunday to make further progress against wildfires that have destroyed thousands of homes and killed 16 people in the Los Angeles area as forecasters again warned of dangerous weather with the return of strong winds this week.

title: Shooting incident targets businessman in Devinuwara
byline: Two unidentified gunmen opened fire in front of the house of a dry fish merchant at Thalpawila, Devinuwara, targeting the businessman.

title: Govt. plans to establish labs for medicine testing: Health Secretary
byline: The Secretary to the Ministry of Health, Dr. Anil Jasinghe, has announced that the government is focusing on the establishment of several laboratories to test medicines in the near future.

title: Fantasy Nail Art Fashion Show held in Sri Lanka
byline: The Fantasy Nail Art Fashion Show 2025 kicked off on Sunday in Sri Lanka’s capital, Colombo.
